#Text=Plettenberg Bay
#Text=Plettenberg Bay ( or Plett ) is a small coastal resort in South Africa 's Western Cape .
#Text=It 's a good stop off point for the Garden Route if you 're looking to be closer to the beach than nearby Knysna .
#Text=By car
#Text=Plett is on the N2 , 240 km from Port Elizabeth , 520 km from Cape Town and 35 km from Knysna .
#Text=By coach
#Text=All major national coaches stop at the Shell garage on the N2 ( 1 km from the town centre ) .
#Text=The Baz bus comes into the town centre .
#Text=you can get a Minivan to/from Knysna .
#Text=See
#Text=Robberg Nature and Marine Reserve .
#Text=A 4-km long peninsula south east of Plett .
#Text=It acts as a speed bump to the sea life that migrates up and down the coast .
#Text=There is a huge Cape Fur seal colony at the foot of the peninsula in the bay , and whales are often seen during in the bay in the whale migration season .
#Text=Great
#Text=Whites have been seen in the bay around the time when seal pups are young .
#Text=There 's also a colony of penguins that are here part of the year .
#Text=There are shorter 30-minute and 2-hour hikes , as well as a more strenuous 4-hour hike around the entire peninsula .
#Text=Do
#Text=Birds of Eden ( At Monkeyland , The Crags , 16 km outside Plett , east along the N2 ) , ☏ +2744 534-8906 , fax : +2744 534-8907 , ✉ birdsofeden@monkeyland.co.za .
#Text=The largest enclosed aviary in the world .
#Text=Dolphin Adventures , ✉ kayak@dolphinadvnetures.co.za .
#Text=Goose Valley Golf Estate ( Goose Valley ) ( N2 Motoway Plett , just outside Plett , towards Port Elizabeth ) , ☏ +2744 533-5082 .
#Text=A beautiful 18-hole golf course designed by Gary Player .
#Text=Ocean Blue Adventures . 1.5 .
#Text=Doing a sea safari is an excellent way to get up close and see the sea life in the bay .
#Text=With close encounter permits , they are allowed up close to the sea life .
#Text=Most trips see some dolphins , seals are always seen , but shark and whale sightings are obviously seasonal .
#Text=lat= .
#Text=Ocean Safaris , ☏ +2782 784-5729 , ✉ info@oceansafaris.co.za .
#Text=Holds a permit to conduct close encounters with the marine life in the bay as well as being fair trade in tourism and Green Ticket certified .
#Text=Owner run company with a passion for the ocean .
#Text=Sightings are great all year round with official season from July-December when we sight both southern right and humpback whales .
#Text=We sight Brydes whales throughout the year with sightings being the most prolific during the summer months .
#Text=Dolphins frequent the bay on almost a daily basis and sightings include : the playful bottlenose , energetic commons , and the endangered humpbacked dolphins .
#Text=Parks & Hiking Trails .
#Text=The Plettenberg Bay region is surely home to one of the finest collections of hiking trails in the world .
#Text=This is where the coastal platform narrows on the Garden Route , bringing the mountains near to the sea .
#Text=Deep and ancient river gorges ; evergreen forests ; colourful fynbos and a spectacular stretch of coastline provide the ideal location for hiking enthusiasts .
#Text=There is a large variety of walks in this region ranging from under an hour to six days in duration
#Text=Surfing and Bodyboarding .
#Text=Plettenberg
#Text=Bay contains some excellent surf spots , including Plett Wedge , Lookout Beach , Keurbooms and The Wreck .
#Text=You may even see some dolphins on the waves with you , and perhaps even a shark or two as well .
#Text=Tsitsikamma Canopy Tours , Darnell Street Stormsriver 6308 , ☏ +2742 281-1836 .
#Text=Enjoy the unequaled beauty of the indigenous forest high up on ten treetop platforms .
#Text=Gently glide along in a harness , on steel cables 30 m above the forest floor .
#Text=Birdlife is abundant ( including Knysna Loeries and the elusive Narina Trojan ) , and your guides will explain the ecology of the lush primeval forest .
#Text=Safety is paramount , and the system has been built to the highest civil engineering standards .
#Text=Guides are fully-trained professionals .
#Text=R495 per person .
#Text=Monkeyland ( From Plettenberg Bay , continue past Keurboomstrand on to The Crags .
#Text=You will notice a Monkeyland sign on the N2 , near the BP Garage ( the garage is also known as the Garden Route Superrette ) .
#Text=Take the turn-off ( on the right ) at this BP Garage and follow the Monkeyland signs for a further 2 km .
#Text=It is situated 2 km off the N2 , and the tarred road is well signed . ) , ☏ +2744 534-8906 , ✉ info@monkeyland.co.za .
#Text=8AM to 5PM .
#Text=Monkeyland is the world 's first free roaming multi-species primate sanctuary .
#Text=Monkeyland has as one of its aims , to create awareness about the plight of primates and to show that with a greater understanding of our primate cousins , that we can all live in harmony .
#Text=Single Ticket : from R230 ( adult ) , R115 ( child 3/12years ) .
#Text=Bramon Wine Estate , ☏ +27445348007 , ✉ restaurant@bramonwines.co.za .
#Text=First wine estate in the Plett area .
#Text=The wines can be tasted at the Estates restaurant
#Text=Buy
#Text=Plettenberg Bay has a number of unique shops with talented and creative designers .
#Text=Centres include :
#Text=The Market Square which is the largest and hosts Pick n Pay , Woolworths and a number of other chainstores .
#Text=Mellvilles Centre hosts the Spar , a charity shop , PNA and a great little coffee shop amongst others .

#Text=Milkwood Centre : Situated on Central Beach and is home to Ocean Safaris holder of one of a few close encounter whale watching permits , Dolphin Adventures Sea kayaking , The Yellow wood Spur , Fat Fish Seafood Restaurant , Live Green wholesome fresh food , and a beach hire and sales shop .
#Text=A great addition to this centre is the newly opened Plett Beachfront accommodation which is the closest you will get to the sea on central beach with great prices .
#Text=Liv Green : Situated in Milkwood Centre on Central Beach .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Mugg ' n Bean , The Market Square , Beacon Way , ☏ +2744 533-1486 , fax : +2744 533-2501 .
#Text=Great place for breakfast , lunch or coffee .
#Text=Enrico ’s Ristorante , Keurbooms Main Beach , ☏ +27445359818 , ✉ info@enricorestaurant.co.za .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Flashbacks on the main road , good lively bar , especially during Matric Rage .
#Text=VIP - Vegas in Plett , is a club just outside the town .
#Text=Great night out !
#Text=The Clubhouse Restaurant ( Goose Valley Restaurant ) , The Clubhouse @ Goose Valley Golf Estate ( Just outside Plett , East on the N2 ) , ☏ +2744 533-0889 .
#Text=7AM-late .
#Text=Lovely golf club dining , varied menu with weekly specials .
#Text=Dinner in the evenings is by booking only and they Cater for functions including weddings , and golf days .
